bioconda.name: bioconductor-pathview
bioconda.summary: a tool set for pathway based data integration and visualization

biotools.summary: Tool set for pathway based data integration and visualization that maps and renders a wide variety of biological data on relevant pathway graphs. It downloads the pathway graph data, parses the data file, maps user data to the pathway, and render pathway graph with the mapped data. In addition, it integrates with pathway and gene set (enrichment) analysis tools for large-scale and fully automated analysis.
